info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 3:16PM EST until January 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. Locally higher amounts possible, especially near Lake Michigan. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte and St. Joseph Counties. In Michigan, Berrien and Cass Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Saturday to 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow, possibly mixed with rain at the start, will develop Saturday afternoon and may become heavy at times late Saturday afternoon into Saturday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
